column3: News;Phnom Penh:------ According to EDC  workers at Kolab Sor hotel took out a Medium Voltage (MV) underground cable which caused electricity outages in several areas across town.------ (1) Preah Monivong Boulevard
column5: Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang II and Khan III
column14: Phnom Penh were affected.------ ------The Technical Working Group reconnected all areas by 1:55 pm.------Electricity of Cambodia is calling for people to be cautious when working near the electricity line
column15: because it may cause inconveniences for electricity supply------
column17: and although they didn’t mention it
